title: The Firing Line
description: Belinda Cooper has been working the same job for six years. She lives and breathes to be at the beck and call of her grumpy, arrogant and filthy rich boss.When she finally decides to up and leave the boss she believes hates her, Belinda discovers things are not always what they seem.Jagger Warren is obsessed with his personal assistant. So obsessed that he is enraged at the idea of her even daring to dream of leaving him.It is a battle of wills. She will do anything to leave his life and he will do anything to make her his.
author: Kayla  Silvers
